desc: Selling the finest needles, notions, threads and needlepoint supplies for craft enthusiasts of all skill levels. Brands such as John James, S. Thomas, Mary Arden, Lee, Silver Needle, Kelly Clark, DeElda, Presencia, Colonial Organic Cotton and Persian Wool.

layout.text: providing you with the finest needles, notions, threads and needlepoint supplies for crafting enthusiasts of all skill levels
